title: Matrix Product States
content:
Matrix Product States #  Origins: DMRG #  The Density Matrix Renormalization Group algorithm…
Infinite DMRG #  Step 1: Superblock Hamiltonian #    \[H = - J \sum_{j=1}^N \sigma_j \sigma_{j+1} - h \sum_{j=1}^N \sigma_j\]  Step 2: #  Step 3: Reduced density matrix #   \[\rho_{i j;i^\prime j^\prime} = \sum_{k,w} \psi_{i,j,k,w} \psi^*_{i^\prime,j^\prime,k,w}\]  Finite DMRG #
